tidbits.title: Cradle of Wine
tidbits.description: Georgia is considered the 'Cradle of Wine,' with an ancient winemaking tradition dating back over 8,000 years, producing unique and flavorful wines.

tidbits.title: Scenic Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country boasts diverse landscapes, from the rugged Caucasus Mountains to the picturesque vineyards of Kakheti and the stunning Black Sea coast.

tidbits.title: Warm Hospitality
tidbits.description: Georgian hospitality, symbolized by 'supra' feasts and heartfelt toasts, is integral to the culture, emphasizing warmth, generosity, and communal gatherings.
